    Give Now

    Areas of Giving

    Get Involved

















Support the Chapman Student Experience

At Chapman University, nothing is more important for our students than:

World-class faculty and cutting-edge learning opportunities
Innovative, enriched programs and activities that shape their vision, goals, career paths
Financial aid and scholarship assistance, which is provided to more than 86% of students
Programming and support for wellness to ensure a seamless growth experience



Learn More







Supporting Chapman University





Give to Chapman
By making a gift to Chapman, you embolden our students’ dreams, celebrate their accomplishments, and provide them with the tools to launch a path to greatness.
Give Now







Areas of Giving
Your gift to Chapman University provides the resources needed to ensure our students and faculty can succeed. Please consider helping in the area most meaningful to you.
Learn Where to Give







Get Involved
Together, the Chapman Family is proud to champion teamwork, compassion, and a commitment to education. Together, we provide guidance, affection, and support for our school, community, and the world.
Get Involved Today











Inspire: The Campaign for Chapman University

Join Chapman in its ambitious goal to raise $500 million, and become a partner in influencing the trajectory of a top university, its research, and the lives of its students.



 Learn More: Inspire Campaign














  
        In The News
      





Daily Bread: Donor Gift Supports Food Pantry at Chapman



Inspired by the depth of Chapman's commitment to education and supporting the needs of all students, Irv and Nancy Chase and Allan and Sandy Fainbarg perpetually endow Chapman University’s ‘Panther Pantry’ with $1.5 million gift.
Read More


Show More
Show Less




Hilbert Museum Breaks Ground on Expansion



The Hilbert Museum of California Art celebrated the official groundbreaking of its expansion on February 15. The year-long construction project will triple the size of the museum, including additional galleries, event spaces, a café, and a research library.
Read More


Show More
Show Less




$1.5 Million From Ferrucci Family Brings Comprehensive Campaign Total to $318 Million



Chapman University is pleased to announce the creation of the Ferrucci Institute for Italian Experience and Research, thanks to a $1.5 million donation from the Ferrucci family. The gift was announced March 11 during the annual Italian Perspectives event at the Musco Center for the Arts.
Read More


Show More
Show Less
